channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Payment, 8th August
item.description:
This is a very busy public street can this pavement be inspected, the whole cracks get worse by day , I have just literally fell because of this , I reported this few time and you send someone to fill it , it needs fixing properly as you see how many times been repaired , I know have a black blue ankle photos to prove this if need be , i witnessed serval people fall ,trip and well not so long ago a pram getting caught and tipping , there going be a serious accident, I have sweep street daily due to leaves berries hiding these cracks , can please be investigated for a whole new repair , we live on road that is very busy with heavy traffic so cracks appear all time due to poor surface , thank you so much think this health safety issue, I can send my photo of my ankle to you if want ,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mottingham Road, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa dumped outside of my property, 8th August
